subject: Cable Television
Interscholastic Athletics
Television
Athletics and Sports
Amateur Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cablevision’s MSG Varsity channel and the New York City Department of Education are negotiating a deal to televise a regular schedule of Public Schools Athletic League games.
snippet: Cablevision’s MSG Varsity channel and the New York City Department of Education are negotiating a deal to televise a regular schedule of Public Schools Athletic League games.
